item.title: OmniDocBench: Benchmarking Diverse PDF Document Parsing with Comprehensive Annotations
item.description: OmniDocBench, a novel benchmark, tackles limitations in current document parsing by introducing a diverse, high-quality dataset with comprehensive annotations, enabling fair multi-level evaluation of …
